    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static AnyValue of​(Object object)
        Creates an AnyValue by doing type inspection. Do not use in production code where performance is important.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to turned into a AnyValue
        Returns:
        the AnyValue corresponding to object.

      • asValue

        public static Value asValue​(Object value)
        Creates a Value from the given object, or if it is already a Value it is returned as it is.

        This is different from Values.of(java.lang.Object) which often explicitly fails or creates a new copy if given a Value.

      • asAnyValue

        public static AnyValue asAnyValue​(Object value)
        Creates an AnyValue from the given object, or if it is already an AnyValue it is returned as it is.

        This is different from of(java.lang.Object) which often explicitly fails or creates a new copy if given an AnyValue.

      • asNodeValue

        public static NodeValue asNodeValue​(Object object)
